complianceText:
The chatbot output is 'VBN' which is one of the part-of-speech tags listed in the description provided between the delimiters <DESC> and </DESC>. The list includes various tags such as CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, and VBZ. Since 'VBN' is explicitly mentioned as a valid tag for 'Verb, past participle', it directly complies with the description provided without needing to know the input.

OK
